headers.value: default-src 'self' https://telegram.org; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://telegram.org; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; connect-src 'self' https://*.firebaseio.com https://*.googleapis.com https://*.telegram.org; img-src 'self' data: https: **https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com**; frame-ancestors 'self' https://web.telegram.org https://telegram.org;
